Description: "PlasmidFinder provides the detection of replicons in the WGSand assigns the plasmids under study to lineages that trace backthe information to the existing knowledge on Inc groups and suggestspossible reference plasmids for each lineage"
EDAM_operations: Genome assembly, Scaffolding, Multilocus sequence typing

EDAM_reduced_topics: Whole genome sequencing, Sequence assembly, Mapping, Probes and primers

bio.tool_description: PlasmidFinder is a tool for the identification and typing of Plasmid Replicons in Whole-Genome Sequencing (WGS).
